content: >**get 20 % off when you buy 3 patterns no coupon needed** the zig zag crochet scarf a 1 row repeat crochet chevron scarf a video tutorial for this pattern is available on my youtube channel https //youtu be/g-8tknqvwsy this crochet pattern is written in us terms this scarf is worked flat lengthwise finished size is 78 inches long x 6 5 inches wide ~ 198 cm x 16 5cm materials 481 yards of a #4 medium-weight yarn yarn used 260g of lion brand basic stitch anti-pilling skein tones in the color honey 5 00 mm h crochet hook yarn needle scissors stitch markers optional > subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be notified when new patterns come out 1 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
